Work of Kim Jong Il Published in Italy 
    Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" was published in booklet by the Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy on March 25.
 The work, published on June 19, Juche 86 (1997), clarifies the reason why it is a fundamental principle to be adhered to in carrying out the cause of socialism to preserve the Juche character and the national identity in the revolution and construction and tasks and ways to do so.

Students' Org. for Nullification of Impeachment Inaugurated in S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The Western District Students' Emergency Measure Committee for Nullification of the Motion on Impeachment, Dissolution of the 16th-term National Assembly and Judgment in the April General Election was reportedly inaugurated with due ceremony on March 27.
 A declaration released at the ceremony said that people came out in the candlelight demonstration against the motion on impeachment, shouting "nullification of impeachment" and "defence of democracy" and that 100,000 students in western district would fight to foil the conservative groups' plot for a political coup.    
 Underscoring the need to push the will of western district students to defend democracy to the judgment in the April general election, the declaration called upon students to become the flag of people's hope.

Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath before Bier of Choe Sang Byok

articles.content:
Greetings to Guinean President
    Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a message of greetings to Guinean President Lansana Conte on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of the proclamation of the second Republic in Guinea.
 The Guinean people have made many achievements in their efforts to achieve the independent progress of the country and the well-being of the nation under the leadership of the president over the last 20 years, the message noted.    
 It expressed the belief that the excellent friendly and cooperative relations existing between the two countries would continue to develop favorably in the future, too, and sincerely wished the Guinean president and people greater success in their work to achieve the political stability of the country and the national unity.
